doc:
Peter Marquardt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Marquardt 0 Peter Charles Marquardt (July 1, 1964 – July 19, 2014) was an American actor and video game producer.He was best known for his debut film role as the drug lord Moco (Spanish for "booger") in Robert Rodriguez's 1992 action film El Mariachi. He landed the role following a chance encounter with Rodriguez at a research facility, where both men were volunteering as test subjects for cholesterol-lowering medication. Rodriguez cast Marquardt in the Spanish-language El Mariachi despite the fact that Marquardt did not speak Spanish.Marquardt reprised the role of Moco for a flashback sequence in Rodriguez's next film, Desperado. He later appeared in Rodriguez's Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over and starred in the 2011 horror-thriller The Shadow People. Outside of film acting, Marquardt was an associate producer on several video games for Ion Storm, including Deus Ex and Wing Commander IV: The Price of Freedom. He also co-produced Dominion: Storm Over Gift 3.Marquardt died in Austin, Texas on July 19, 2014. He was 50. Peter_Charles_Marquardt ( July_1_,_1964 – July_19_,_2014 ) was an_American_actor_and_video_game_producer.He was_best_known for his_debut_film_role as the_drug lord Moco ( Spanish for "_booger_" ) in Robert_Rodriguez 's 1992_action film_El_Mariachi . He landed the_role following a_chance_encounter with Rodriguez at a_research_facility , where both_men were_volunteering as test_subjects for cholesterol-lowering_medication . Rodriguez cast Marquardt in the_Spanish-language_El_Mariachi despite the_fact that Marquardt did_not_speak Spanish.Marquardt reprised the_role of Moco for a_flashback_sequence in Rodriguez 's_next_film , Desperado . He later appeared in Rodriguez 's_Spy_Kids_3-D : Game_Over and starred in the_2011_horror-thriller The_Shadow_People . Outside of film_acting , Marquardt was an_associate_producer on several_video_games for Ion_Storm , including Deus_Ex_and_Wing_Commander_IV : The_Price of Freedom . He also co-produced Dominion : Storm Over Gift_3 . Marquardt died in Austin , Texas on July_19_,_2014 . He was 50 .
